name: Fonake
description:
This is a snake like game made with html and javascript. The snake does not grow and you can't die . The game goes on forever. Do not expect too much, I made this to test something. You can do whatever you want with the file as long as you link this page. 

Controls: WASD or buttons

The game is also available here:
https://bestgaming1320.github.io/games/fonake
